title: Build IEE Workforce Platform - Web Version

requirements.text: Create worker authentication system with profile creation including fields for name, mobile number, unique auto-generated Worker ID, skills selection (multi-select), experience level, availability toggle, preferred wage range, and location input

quotes: Worker Profile: Unique Worker ID (auto-generated), QR Code ID, Skills selection (multi-select), Experience level, Availability toggle, Preferred wage range, Location auto-detect

acceptanceCriteria: Worker can create profile with all required fields
Unique Worker ID is automatically generated upon registration
Skills can be selected from predefined list with multi-select capability
Availability can be toggled on/off
Profile data is persisted in backend

requirements.text: Generate and display unique QR code for each worker based on their Worker ID that can be used for identification and attendance tracking
acceptanceCriteria: QR code is generated for each worker upon profile creation
QR code contains worker's unique ID
QR code is displayable in worker profile
QR code can be scanned for identification

requirements.text: Create employer authentication system with company profile setup including fields for company name, contact person, mobile number, company type, and location

quotes: Employer authentication: OTP login, Company profile setup

acceptanceCriteria: Employer can create company profile with all required fields
Profile data is validated and persisted
Employer can view and edit their company profile

requirements.text: Build job posting system for employers to create single or bulk job listings with fields for required skill, wage amount, duration, shift timing, number of workers needed, job location, and job description

quotes: Post single or bulk jobs, Set: Required skill, Wage, Duration, Shift timing, Number of workers needed, Location

acceptanceCriteria: Employers can create new job postings with all specified fields
Bulk job option allows posting multiple worker slots for same job
Job postings are saved and retrievable
Posted jobs have unique job IDs

requirements.text: Implement job matching algorithm that matches workers to jobs based on skill match percentage, distance radius from job location, worker availability status, and reliability score with priority given to verified workers with high reliability scores

quotes: Match workers based on: Skill match %, Distance radius, Availability, Reliability score, Attendance history, Previous ratings
Priority order: Verified + High reliability + Nearby

acceptanceCriteria: Algorithm calculates skill match percentage between worker skills and job requirements
Distance filtering works based on configurable radius
Only available workers are included in matches
Results are sorted by priority: verified status, reliability score, then distance
Matched workers list is returned for each job

requirements.text: Create job discovery interface for workers showing nearby job listings with filters for distance, wage range, and duration, with ability to accept or reject job offers and view real-time job status

quotes: Receive nearby job alerts, Filter by distance, wage, duration, Accept / Reject jobs, Real-time job status, Bulk job slot visibility

acceptanceCriteria: Workers can view list of matched jobs
Filter controls for distance, wage, and duration are functional
Accept/Reject buttons update job application status
Job status is displayed clearly (pending, accepted, rejected, completed)
Bulk job slots show number of positions available

requirements.text: Build QR-based attendance tracking system where employers can scan worker QR codes for check-in and check-out, with work history tracking and job completion records stored per worker

quotes: QR Check-in / Check-out, Work history tracking, Job completion record

acceptanceCriteria: Employer interface includes QR scanner functionality
Check-in records timestamp and job ID when worker QR is scanned
Check-out records completion timestamp
Work history shows all past jobs with dates and duration
Completed jobs are marked in worker's job completion record

requirements.text: Implement rating and reliability score system where employers can rate workers after job completion on a 5-star scale with optional remarks, and calculate cumulative reliability score based on ratings, attendance history, and job completion rate

quotes: Rating system, Reliability score, 3-Level skill status indicator

acceptanceCriteria: Employers can submit 5-star rating and text remarks after job completion
Reliability score is calculated from average rating, attendance rate, and completion rate
Worker profile displays current reliability score
Rating history is stored and viewable
3-level skill status indicator (beginner/intermediate/expert) is displayed based on experience

requirements.text: Create payment tracking interface for workers showing payment status for each completed job, earning history with date and amount, and total earnings summary

quotes: Wallet: Payment status, Earning history, Download invoice

acceptanceCriteria: Workers can view payment status for each job (pending, paid)
Earning history displays all completed jobs with amounts and dates
Total earnings summary is calculated and displayed
Payment records are linked to specific job completions

requirements.text: Build employer workforce management dashboard showing list of hired workers, live attendance status for current jobs, ability to request worker replacement, and workforce analytics including total hires, completion rates, and average ratings

quotes: Live attendance tracking, Replacement request, Workforce analytics dashboard, Payment tracking

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays all current and past worker assignments
Attendance status shows who is checked in/out in real-time
Replacement request button allows employer to request new worker for unfilled slot
Analytics section shows total hires count, job completion rate, and average worker ratings
Payment tracking shows pending and completed payments

requirements.text: Create admin dashboard with system-wide metrics including total workers registered, active employers count, total jobs posted, job fill rate percentage, average time to fill jobs, worker retention rate, and employer retention rate

quotes: For Admin: Total workers registered, Active employers, Jobs posted, Fill rate %, Avg time to fill, Monthly revenue, Worker retention, Employer retention

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view dashboard with all key metrics
Metrics are calculated from backend data
Fill rate percentage shows (filled jobs / total jobs) * 100
Average time to fill calculates mean hours from job post to first worker acceptance
Retention rates track active users over time periods
Dashboard updates reflect current system state

requirements.text: Implement employer job candidate review interface showing matched workers for each job posting with their reliability scores, skills, and distance, with ability to confirm worker slots and view auto-fill suggestions for bulk hiring

quotes: Matching: View matched candidates, View reliability score, Confirm slots, Auto-fill option

acceptanceCriteria: Employer can view list of matched candidates for each job posting
Each candidate card shows reliability score, skills, experience, and distance
Confirm button allows employer to select specific workers
Auto-fill option automatically selects top-ranked workers to fill all slots
Confirmed workers are notified of job assignment

requirements.text: Design modern, professional, and minimal user interface with intuitive navigation optimized for ease of use, using a clean color scheme that avoids blue and purple, with large touch targets and clear typography suitable for users with varying literacy levels

quotes: The app should look modern, professional, minimal, and highly intuitive for low-literacy users

acceptanceCriteria: UI uses clean, minimal design with clear visual hierarchy
Color scheme is professional and avoids blue/purple
Navigation is intuitive with clear labels and icons
Touch targets are large enough for easy interaction
Typography is legible with appropriate font sizes
Interface is accessible for users with low digital literacy

constraints: Must use Motoko for backend implementation
Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Cannot implement mobile app - web application only
Cannot integrate external databases (PostgreSQL/MongoDB) - use Motoko stable storage
Cannot implement SMS/OTP authentication - use Internet Identity instead
Cannot implement document upload for ID verification
Cannot implement selfie verification or image processing
Cannot integrate external payment processors or payroll systems
Cannot implement push notifications via Firebase
Cannot deploy to AWS/GCP - must deploy on Internet Computer
nonGoals: Mobile application development with Flutter or React Native
Document verification with Aadhar/Labor ID uploads
Cloud hosting on AWS or GCP
Skill certification marketplace in initial version
